videos.headline: Pitt RB records first carry since beating cancer
videos.description: Pittsburgh RB James Conner picks up his first carry of the season, making his return from his battle with cancer official.

videos.headline: James Conner hauls in second TD of game
videos.description: Nathan Peterman hits James Conner in the end zone for a 9-yard touchdown, Conner's second TD of the game.

videos.headline: Quadree Henderson opens the 2nd Half with a 96 yard TD return
videos.description: Steve Weyler kickoff for 61 yds , Quadree Henderson return for 96 yds for a TD (Chris Blewitt KICK)

videos.headline: Villanova makes a big play to get on the scoreboard
videos.description: Nathan Peterman sacked by Drew Wiley for a loss of 16 yards Nathan Peterman fumbled, recovered by Villa Rob Rolle , return for 0 yards , return for 3 yds

videos.headline: Blocked FG by Villanova
videos.description: Chris Blewitt 47 yd FG BLOCKED blocked by Tanoh Kpassagnon
